name: Stickman Craft Survival Simulator
description:
You flew on an airplane over the island. But something terrible happened! Stickman woke up on an stranded island in a deep ocean. Now your goal is to survive at any cost and get out of the island!
Collect the necessary resources. Beware of wild wild animals. Pick up different food - bananas, coconuts.
You can find many interesting things on the island. For example, a cup - to cook your own food.
Use the tools to break the boxes. In them you will find the resources necessary for escape.
Make your way to the island where the plane fell. Find the signal gun there. Do everything to save you.
Start an amazing adventure now with Stickman Craft Survival Simulator game!
